topic.title: Custom Zeronet site creation
topic.body: Discussion about creating custom sites on Zeronet (cause cloning is gay)

1_19jbACPsnTxWhqTnMYTfbxBBvx6xmD656r.body: yeah I can almost see the professional hackers who are DDoS-ing CS 1.6 servers and stealing facebook accs with premade phishers :D

UI:like this I made when I was 12years old xddd
http://users.atw.hu/szavazzra/

1_1HVJvkzPdXDEtsjBSzFLyx6KsG8Tg2nnr5.body:
Like I wrote.
As a noobie and newbie on Zeronet,I wanna get some knowledge about creating custom sites.I mean using the databases(for ex. an easy hit counter would be cool),how to make interactive sites(as I think PHP won't work here xd) etc.
Please a pro,give some suggestions :D

2_1HVJvkzPdXDEtsjBSzFLyx6KsG8Tg2nnr5.body:
I thought we need a topic for this also.
Anyways,I have my new CPU(Pentium G4400),and just overclocked it :D I'm pretty impressed by this lil guy,single thread performance is crazy:
http://valid.x86.fr/bench/1urrrx/1

1_1L6AzNZhaGYwQcDWNffD1najBfyvzeKhsG.body:
When I was a beginner,I used to "hack" routers.Just get an ip scanner (I prefer Angry IP Scanner),and start scanning around random IP's.For example your IP is 89.223.223.100,than scan the range from 89.223.223.1 to 89.223.223.254.There's a good chance that you will find something interesting - a router,a web camera,etc.
If you need some IP addresses to start from,here's the log of my site:  http://users.atw.hu/joczo/adatok.htm
I have found so much things in those addresses :D

1_1HWKxE8ZGQLAgdq9FJT5RgHytkmnK7VBEh.body:
seeders shouldn't be problem.and there is no need to set up a seed server...if you write about interesting thing,or even if it interests just a couple of people,you are good to go,there are your seeders :D for example here is my site: http://127.0.0.1:43110/15iZnHWsnhubk6JA9Ldb7KxDHJ7shBpYGj/
there is completely nothing on it (yet) and people are still reading it.some days ago i saw almost 50 people online...on a site that says "test" :D

1_1NScpxmKApvAk85ubF2SLrBgkniZcm85Hr.body: So basicly,are here any active users?Or this site is dead?
